channel.title: Digital on Glyn Darkin
channel.description: Recent content in Digital on Glyn Darkin

item.title: Demystifying the Digital Society
item.description: Earlier this year (2018) I was fortunate enough to be asked to do the keynote at the http://digitaltransformations.org/ conference. The context of this conference is slightly different to most tech confirences as it seeks to bring together technologists and artists and poses a number of cultural questions. Introduction My name is Glyn Darkin, I am and IT consultant and spend my life helping my clients on their journey to being more digital.
